message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our exclusive product, which I believe would greatly benefit your endeavors. Given its value and the potential it holds for you, I am offering it to you at a special introductory price of $14,000. This is an exceptional opportunity to acquire a high-quality item that is worth $12,000 to you, and I am confident it will exceed your expectations. Please let me know if you are interested in discussing this further or if there's any way I can assist you in making your decision.
